hymn.title: I have set before you life and death

layout.singingstanza: I have set be -- fore you life and death, bless -- ing and curse; There -- fore choose life that you and your seed may live, I have set be -- fore you life and death, bless -- ing and curse; There -- fore choose life that you and your seed may live, In lov -- ing Je -- ho -- vah your God by lis -- ten -- ing to His voice and hold -- ing fast to Him; for He is your life; In lov -- ing Je -- ho -- vah your God by lis -- ten -- ing to His voice and hold -- ing fast to Him; for He is your life and the length of your days.

lyrics.stanza: In loving Jehovah your God by listening to His voice and holding fast to Him; for He is your life; In loving Jehovah your God by listening to His voice and holding fast to Him; for He is your life and the length of your days.
